games.howToPlayText:
Your goal is to get all the marbles in the level into the hole! The number in the top left of the screen is the amount of marbles that have to get into the hole. To make a marble move, left click near it to create a blast and watch it roll!

There will be boxes in the level - these are extra marbles you can unlock! Have your marble collide into the box to obtain them. The amount of balls in the box are displayed on the box. When you have multiple marbles, you can press the arrow keys or A or D to switch between which marble you want to have in focus.

games.title: Cannon Balls
games.description: Try to be the master of destruction, heat up the buildings neatly and show no mercy! In 'Cannon Balls 3D' it depends on how skillfully you place the shots so that the structures collapse as efficiently as possible. Watch your ammo, because it's limited. But don't worry. There will also come a time when you will bring the cannon to the edge of functionality. Especially when the great bombs are used. So what are you waiting for?
games.howToPlayText:
Aiming & Shooting:
On desktop/browser: Move your mouse to aim the cannon and click the left button to fire.
On mobile: Drag your finger (or stylus) to aim, and tap once to shoot.
Weak Points and TNT:
Target weak spots in the structure (like glass or foundation blocks) to maximize collapse.
Hitting TNT (when present) triggers chain reactions to clear multiple blocks at once.
Bomb Power-Ups:
A bomb meter fills up as you shoot shapes and earn points. When full, tap the bomb icon to switch cannonballs to bombs temporarily.
You‚Äôll normally get only three bombs per level, so use them wisely on tougher structures or large clusters.

games.title: Millionaire Factory
games.description:
Millionaire Factory üî©üè≠ is a fun and addictive üéâ clicker game where players collect Metal to grow their fortune. By tapping the giant Metal button üëÜ, players gather Metals, convert them into Money üí∞, and invest in upgrades to build their own factory empire.

The game offers a growth journey that starts with a small piece of Metal üî© and expands into a massive factory and investment fortune üìàüìâ.
games.howToPlayText:
Metal Production üî©:
At the heart of the game lies a massive Metal (Gear) button. Each tap üëÜ earns you Metal, which serves as your primary source of income.

Metals ‚Üí Money üíµ:
You can convert collected Metals into Money üí∏ to keep your economy running. For example:
‚û°Ô∏è 1 Metal = 0.1 Money
‚û°Ô∏è 10 Metals = 1 Money

Income and Robot Program Upgrades ü§ñüè≠:
With the money you earn üíµ, you can:

Purchase upgrades that increase the amount of Metal gained per tap üí™.

Invest in automation systems such as the Basic Auto Robot 3Ô∏èüî®, Regional Robot Program ‚öíÔ∏è, and National Automatic Robot Fleet.
These systems generate passive income every 5 seconds.

Factories üè≠:
At the start of the game, you begin with a single factory, which you can upgrade üîß. You can also purchase up to three additional factories üè≠, each of which can be further developed.
Every factory has a progress bar üìä representing its Metal production. Once the bar fills, the factory automatically sells the produced Metal, adds the profit üíµ to your balance, and the cycle restarts.

Fast Investments‚ö°:
üìä In the investment section, carefully observe the **candlestick movements** left by the dynamic system.
‚è±Ô∏è Within about **15 seconds**, predict whether the price will go **up or down.**
üí∞ Then, open a **trade** in the direction you believe it will move, using your chosen amount.
üéØ If your prediction is correct, you‚Äôll earn **double** the amount you invested! üíéüöÄ


Achievements üèÖ:
There are 6 unique achievements üåü to unlock throughout the game, based on the total Metals collected üî©, upgrades purchased üîù, and wealth accumulated üí∞.

Your drone glides and ricochets from surface to surface, smoothly darting through tight spaces full of traps and twists.

Levels are short, intense, and packed with surprises. New traps and tricky tiles will keep you on your toes as you dash your way to perfection. Fast reflexes and smart movement make all the difference!

games.howToPlayText:
‚Ä¢ Deck Building: Before starting a match, create your deck using cards you‚Äôve collected. Customize your deck based on strategy‚Äîfocus on attack-heavy units, healing abilities, or powerful spells. 
‚Ä¢ Terrain Zones: At the start of the game, choose which terrains to place on your side of the board. Each terrain type allows only certain creatures to be summoned there, except Rainbow Creatures, which are flexible. Terrain types:
- Cornfields: Strong attackers.
- Sandlands: Defensive powerhouses.
- Blue Plains: Balanced but unpredictable.
- Candy Kingdom: Weak but great at healing allies.
- Useless Swamp: Special ability users or direct-damage dealers.
‚Ä¢ Turn-Based Mechanics: On your turn, draw cards, spend resources (Magic Points), and deploy creatures, buildings, or spells onto the field. Attack enemy creatures or target their towers directly when possible. 
‚Ä¢ Winning Conditions: Outlast your opponent by maintaining stronger forces, controlling key areas, and dealing consistent damage.

games.title: StickerBall
games.description:
Stickerball is a fast-paced game where you collect stickers using a ball with unique abilities! Your goal is to collect 180 colorful stickers across 9 levels by completing challenges and activating triggers that change the game‚Äôs rules. Each turn, 10 stickers fly onto the field from a purchased pack, but any uncollected ones disappear‚Äîact quickly and precisely!

The game shines with 14 dynamic triggers: freeze stickers, double rewards with "x2," turn the ball into a magnet or ghost, activate "disco" mode, or control a dual ball! The more stickers you collect in one turn, the higher your combo and the more coins you earn. Holo-stickers, with their unique designs, grant double the currency!

Play across 12 vibrant, randomly changing fields. Buy sticker packs, upgrade your collection, and strategize by activating triggers at the perfect moment to maximize rewards.
games.howToPlayText:
How to play:
1. Aiming:
Move your cursor to aim-the arrow on the ball shows the strike direction.

2. Power Charging:
Hold LMB to fill the arrow‚Äôs power gauge. Release to launch the ball! Striking too early cancels the shot.

3. Collecting Stickers:
After striking, the ball bounces off walls, collecting stickers, coins, and crystals. The more you gather in one turn, the higher your combo and bonuses!

4. Triggers:
Collect special icons (magnet, x2, freeze, etc.) to power up the ball or alter sticker behavior. For example, "Ghost" lets the ball pass through triggers, while "Double Move" grants a second strike without new stickers appearing.

5. Buying Packs:
Before your first turn, choose a free Level 1 pack. Each pack contains 100 stickers, with 10 appearing per turn.

6. Strategy Tips:
Use "Freeze" or "Bonus" to increase the number of stickers on the field.
Combine triggers like "Magnet" + "x2" for double rewards.
Prioritize Holo-stickers - they grant x2 coins!

games.title: Bubble Tower
games.description:
Bubble Tower 3D is a relaxing 3D bubble-pop / color-match puzzle game.
You rotate a tower (or cylinder) loaded with colored bubbles around its vertical axis.
Your goal is to shoot bubbles, matching colors to connect groups of the same color. When matched, those bubbles pop/drop off the tower.
There are many levels; difficulty increases as you go. More bubble colors, trickier arrangements, limited shots, etc.
Also there are diamonds or special gems you can collect in certain levels. These may unlock ‚Äúshiny shapes‚Äù or cosmetic things.
The graphics are clean, simple, and meant for relaxing casual play. It mixes mental challenge (where to shoot, color matching) with a soothing visual.
games.howToPlayText:
A tower appears with a cluster of bubbles of various colors. There‚Äôs a shooter that holds the next bubble to fire.
You can rotate the tower around (usually by dragging left/right or using onscreen controls) to bring bubbles of matching color in position.
Tap or drag to aim, then let go (or tap a location) to shoot the bubble toward the tower. Match it with other bubbles of the same color.
When you connect 3 or more bubbles of the same color, those bubbles pop/drop off. Bubbles that are hanging (i.e. no longer connected to the base or other bubbles) also fall off.
Some levels include diamonds or special gems placed in certain parts of the bubble structure. You need to target those, maybe by matching bubbles around them or popping surrounding bubbles to let them fall.
You win a level if all bubbles (or the required ones) are cleared. If you run out of shots (or fail to clear the required bubbles), you lose and must retry.

games.title: Happy Glass - Draw to Fill
games.description: Happy Glass: Draw to Fill is a creative and relaxing puzzle game where your goal is to fill a happy glass with water ‚Äî but there's a twist! You must draw lines and shapes to guide the water flow into the glass. Think strategically, draw creatively, and use physics to your advantage as you solve increasingly challenging levels. The game features colorful visuals, satisfying animations, and a joyful glass that smiles only when full. Whether you're a fan of brain teasers or just love doodling your way through clever puzzles, this game is sure to entertain and test your ingenuity.
games.howToPlayText: Use your finger or mouse to draw lines or shapes on the screen. These drawings will act as paths, ramps, or barriers to guide the water into the glass. The goal is to fill the glass above the dashed line without spilling too much water. Think carefully and use your imagination to solve each level ‚Äî and don‚Äôt forget, the glass only smiles when it‚Äôs full!

games.title: Okay
games.description:
Okay? is a minimalist puzzle game that turns simple shapes into clever challenges. Every level is made of blocks, lines, and objects placed on a clean, abstract screen. Your goal is simple: clear all the objects with just one perfect move.

Draw a line with your finger, release it, and watch it bounce around the screen. If your move is right, the line will hit and remove every object until the screen is empty. Sounds easy? As levels go up, the puzzles get smarter, requiring perfect angles, timing, and logic.
games.howToPlayText:
Your goal is to clear all the elements (lines, blocks, etc.) from the board.
You draw a line (with your finger / touch) starting from somewhere, and that line interacts with the elements on screen.
The drawn line will ‚Äúpop‚Äù or hit the elements, making them disappear (‚Äúclear all the elements‚Äù) if done correctly.
There are many levels, increasingly challenging.
Some puzzles are simple; others require more precise dragging, angles, and timing.

games.title: Unravel Eggs Puzzle
games.description: Celebrate Easter weekend in style this year with the sweet new puzzle game, Unravel Eggs Puzzle! Complete each level by untangling eggs such that each line connecting eggs is not intersected by any other line connecting eggs. Warm up with some light puzzles and work your way up to an egg-tangling like you've never seen! Happy Easter!
games.howToPlayText:
Grab an egg:
Touch and drag an egg to move it around the screen.

Reposition to avoid intersections:
Adjust positions so that none of the connecting lines between eggs cross each other. All lines must be ‚Äúuntangled.‚Äù

Change color to green:
When the arrangement has no intersecting lines, the eggs and the lines turn green, meaning the level is solved.
